intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Coastal Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It provides detailed descriptions of all level 5 classes used in the Coastal Zones product, outlining their geographic characteristics, available input datasets, and relevant interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of land cover and land use in coastal regions, facilitating the creation of reliable datasets for environmental monitoring and policy support.
